Woof woof, our dearest user, 

If you are a first-time user, we welcome you, if you are a returning user, we are glad to have you back. 

Brief Instruction 

Duration 

You are expecting to spend less than 5 minutes finishing the survey. 

Question Page 
you will be given a survey with a total of seven multiple choices questions. The answers might not be an exact presentation of your true answer, please try your best to choose the closest answer. 

Click on the Next button after an answer is selected to go to the next question. 
Click on the Previous button If you want to reselect the answer to a previous question. 
Click on the Go Fetch button on the last question to see your result. 

Result Page 
The result page will display less than 10 dog breeds that most match you. 

Click on the picture to learn more about the breed from the American Kennel Club website. 
Click on the Home button at the bottom right corner of the screen to restart the survey. 

Privacy 
All user data and input will be stored locally in the device the user is using. All the stored data and input will be deleted once the user closes the application. 

Disclaimer 
This application is meant to be used in a casual and informative manner. We do not hold responsibility for any personal choices made by the user. Please be responsible when you are deciding to own a dog.
